title: Make Me A Blessing
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c

v1: Out in the highways and byways of life
Carry the sunshine where darkness is rife,
v2: Tell the sweet story of Christ and His love,
Tell of His pow'r to forgive;
Others will trust Him if only you prove
v3: Give as 'twas given to you in your need,
Love as the Master loved you;
Be to the helpless a helper indeed,
c1: Out of my life may Jesus shine;
Make me a blessing to someone today.
